sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: What is the length of a side in an equilateral triangle if the perimeter is 18 cm?
message_2:
In an equilateral triangle, all three sides are of equal length. To find the length of one side, we can simply divide the perimeter by the number of sides.

Perimeter = 18 cm
Number of sides = 3

Length of one side = Perimeter / Number of sides = 18 cm / 3 = 6 cm

The length of a side in the equilateral triangle is 6 cm.
